metadata.description: Official Fairmind Integration Plugin marketplace for Claude Code

plugins.name: fairmind-integration
plugins.description: Team collaboration with 6 role-based agents and 9 technology-specific skills. Agents: Atlas (Tech Lead), Echo (Software Engineer), Tess (QA Engineer), Code Reviewer, Debug Detective, Shield (Cybersecurity). Skills cover frontend, backend, Python, LangChain, Playwright, and AI systems.
